name: USA Army Troops Training School 3D Full
name_original: USA Army Troops Training School 3D Full
description:
Ever dreamed to be a highly disciplined American soldier? Then it’s your chance to do it right now! You’re not at school anymore, now you’re a recruit of special training camp with serious obstacle courses! So get up and run with USA Army Troops Training School 3D game!
Become one of the best soldiers at this tournament! Time for each contest is limited, so you should train really hard to pass it successfully and serve your country well! Here is your training schedule, recruit, obey it strictly and you’ll beat every complicated obstacle course up! Prove your skills and become the best soldier ever!
Feel the real spirit of the US Army during this difficult tournament and remember: there always is a room for improvement! If you are not in a good shape now, then you won’t be able to repel any enemy’s attack! Run as fast as you can and pass such difficult obstacles as ropes, tottering bridges, balancing beams or even pointed fences! Gain a power you’ve never dreamed of! Every track of USA Army Troops Training School 3D game is waiting for you!
Mind your energy indicator performing different tricks! Earn points for each successfully done mission and buy power-ups to increase your stamina level and pass through more difficult way! Every obstacle course is really unique, so think ahead and allocate your vigor evenly to succeed! This camp will challenge not only your physical but also your psychological characteristics!
USA Army Troops Training School 3D features:
• Amazing army training camp game
• Wide range of difficult obstacle course
• Limited time for each track
• Wonderful 3D graphics
Dip into a life of American soldiers! Train hard and become the best recruit ever! Improve your skills and have fun with USA Army Troops Training School 3D!
